short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist and useful new-tab page for Vanderbilt undergraduates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Vanderbilt dashboard provides the essential links for every Vanderbilt undergraduate student. Email, Brightspace, YES, Meal Money, Dining, and The Hustler. As well, upload your academic schedule for a customizable, efficient, and minimalist dashboard.

More content coming soon!


-----------------Version Log-----------------
1.0:
-random backgrounds with different effects
-resizable button links
-current time and greeting
-resizable pop out schedule window

1.1:
-fixed a bug causing the clock to display the wrong time
-fixed a bug causing the greeting to stop displaying

1.2:
-general performance enhancements

1.3:
-updated tab logo
